sentences.sContent: You have not chosen an encryption key.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have not chosen an encryption key.
sentences.sCn: 您还没有选择一个加密密钥。

sentences.sContent: I really like this feature, but after adding it to the installation the request to enter the encryption key is far from obvious.
sentences.sContent_eng: I really like this feature, but after adding it to the installation the request to enter the encryption key is far from obvious.
sentences.sCn: 我非常喜欢这个特性，但是在安装是勾选了这个设置后，输入加密密钥的请求却无从找寻。

phrases.pCn: 密码索引；密码键；加密钥匙
